text: @JoeBiden Unlike You, Joe, Huh; What Have You Done Lately To Fight This Coronavirus...After All, Aren't We All In This Together As A Country???   Is There Really Any Time Left For All These Cheap Shots At The President When People Are Dying...Your Attitude Sucks; Shame On You!!!
